revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Magnadyne |model=MV2400 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, repeater |fcc_id=ZGM-MV2400 |ic_id=23051-MV2400 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=560 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=MV2400-2.4G |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_pass=admin }}
"R1430_Ver1.2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Brand website: www.magnadyne.com
MV2458 is also mentioned in the user manual. It could be a variant which may be certified separately in the future. There appear to be two different products pictured in the internal photos. One has a single Qualcomm Atheros chip and another appears to be a dual-band solution with two QCA chips. "R122QH_VER1.1" is silkscreened on that product.
